title: Why is Cardi b acts so weird and foolish? - Quora
tags: Female Rappers and Hip Hop Artists

response.answer_text: She knows that shes has a massive fan base to support her in anything that she does. For example, the fact that she admitted to drugging and robbing men for their money. When she did this, her stans on twitter blindly accepted her apology without a second thought, even though she should be in jail right now. She can get away with these things now and have no consequences.
